title: tripura darppa
sahitya:
tripura darppa bhanjanAya trailOkya pUjitAya tuhina giri sutAvarAya sarva mangaLam


caraNam 1    shankarAya sAdhujana vashankarAya duSTa jana bhayankarAya bhOgi bhUSaNAya mangaLam
    caraNam 2    mangala pradAya bAlamuraLI gAna mOhitAya mangaLam sadAshivAya mahita mangaLam
